snippet: François Hollande has been elected France's second Socialist president. Nicolas Sarkozy, in his concession speech, called for unity and respect for the Republic. The vote was closer than many expected and, like the 2000 election in the U.S. suggests...
abstract: François Hollande has been elected France's second Socialist president. Nicolas Sarkozy, in his concession speech, called for unity and respect for the Republic. The vote was closer than many expected and, like the 2000 election in the U.S. suggests a deeply divided nation.

headline.main: Hollande Squeaks It Out, Paris Erupts, Sarkozy Concedes
